newsitem.title: USA: NBA BASKETBALL-BULLS FORWARD BRIAN WILLIAMS FINED $5,000 FOR FOUL GESTURE.
newsitem.headline: NBA BASKETBALL-BULLS FORWARD BRIAN WILLIAMS FINED $5,000 FOR FOUL GESTURE.

text.p: The National Basketball Association fined Bulls forward Brian Williams $5,000 Tuesday for making an obscene gesture during Chicago's win at Atlanta on Sunday.
After Williams fouled out with 7:03 remaining in the fourth quarter, he made the gesture as he walked towards the Bulls' bench.
The Bulls won the game 89-80 to take a 3-1 lead in their best-of-seven Eastern Conference semifinal series against the Hawks.
The fine was levied by Rod Thorn, NBA senior vice president of basketball operations.
